experiences.notes: Delivering scalable React/Next.js applications for Delos Company and RCX Sports. Designed reusable component systems using Material UI, Chakra UI, and Shadcn UI. Led performance optimizations through SSR, code splitting, and rendering efficiency improvements. Built complex multi-workflow platform interfaces and integrated Contentful CMS enabling non-technical teams to manage content autonomously.

Delivered high-impact solutions for international clients including Vrio (payment portal with Next.js/TypeScript), Wpromote (Shopify/Magento storefronts with React), REAL Evals (complex UI simulations featured by The New York Times), and FactuPro (modern invoicing system with Next.js/Shadcn UI/Tailwind). Specialized in SSR, performance optimization, and scalable component architectures.

Delivered and maintained React/Redux interfaces for Science37's clinical research platform using JavaScript and TypeScript. Developed reusable UI components with Storybook and partnered with distributed teams across multiple time zones in remote Agile environments.

Led Anti-Money Laundering initiatives including impact analysis and effort estimation. Developed and maintained COBOL applications in batch and online (CICS) environments with DB2, MQ messaging, and VSAM/QSAM files. Managed production incidents ensuring system stability under strict SLAs.

Developed COBOL components for financial and high-volume batch systems across multiple banking institutions. Performed requirements analysis, system enhancements, and technical design. Leveraged DB2, MQ, JCL, and CICS for enterprise data processing in mission-critical environments.
